thread.section_title: CoolFrames.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CoolFrames.com | www.coolframes.com | 2 of 16
thread.title: kiurk128

author: kiurk128
title: kiurk128
text: After I was going thru Google looking for Flexon E1002 frames I almost got taken by a category of Google Search which were sponsored and were bait and switch. Finally I returned to CoolFrames.com and I received a 15% discount offer which put them in my price range. It wasn't easy since the discount came as a surprise after looking around at the CoolFrames site. I would recommend CoolFrames mainly because I trust their ResellerRatings.com listing and I had no issues with them.
